params._data: Array of SendData structs, each containing the data for a single payment. Must be sorted by token address, with 0xEeeeeEeeeEeEeeEeEeEeeEEEeeeeEeeeeeeeEEeE used as the token address for the chain's native asset.
params._tollCommitment: The toll commitment to use for all payments.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

approveToken(address).notice: Whenever a new token is added to Umbra, this method must be called by the owner to support that token in this contract.

batchSend(uint256,(address,address,uint2.notice: Batch send ETH and tokens via Umbra.
